card.name: Crystal Memory
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Search your deck. You may take a card from your deck and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

card.name: Deadly Fighter Braid Claw
card.text: ■ This creature attacks each turn Attack if Able

card.name: Eureka Charger
card.text: ■ Draw a card. ■ Charger

card.name: Ragmal, Spirit Knight
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of your creatures in the battle zone and put it into your mana zone. Then your opponent chooses one of their creatures in the battle zone and puts it into its owner's mana zone.

card.name: Guard Grip
card.text: ■ Draw a card.

card.name: Future Blueprint
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Look at the top 6 cards of your deck. You may choose a creature from them, show that creature to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

card.name: Prince Avaraldo, Cavalier of Thunder
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. You may put any number of spells revealed in this way into your hand, and the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

card.name: Savage Earth
card.text: ■ Put a non-evolution creature from your mana zone. Choose a non-evolution creature from your opponent's mana zone and your opponent puts it. Then choose one of your creatures and one of your opponent's creatures from the battle zone and put them into their owner's mana zones.

card.name: DNA Spark
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Tap all your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. ■ If you have 2 shields or less, you may shieldify the top card of your deck.

card.name: Father Earth
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and put it into its owner's mana zone. Then choose a non-evolution creature from your opponent's mana zone. Your opponent puts that creature into the battle zone.

card.name: Bone Dance Charger
card.text: ■ Put the top 2 cards of your deck into your graveyard. ■ Charger

card.name: Reckless Cut Scrapper
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Destroy any number of your opponent's creatures that have total cost 6 or less.

card.name: Brain Storm
card.text: ■ Draw up to 3 cards. Then put 2 cards from your hand on top of your deck in any order.

card.name: Lifeplan Charger
card.text: ■ Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. You may take a creature from among them, show that creature to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. ■ Charger

card.name: Shirauo Giant
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ When you put this creature or a creature that costs 7 or more into the battle zone, you may put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

card.name: Honenbe, Skeletal Guardian
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may put the top 3 cards of your deck into your graveyard. If you do, you may return a creature from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Aqua Spellblue
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, shuffle your deck, then reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a spell, you may cast it For No Cost

card.name: Death Shuteron, Hell's Funeral Service
card.text: ■ Triple Breaker ■ End Step ■ When this creature leaves the battle zone, destroy all creatures.

card.name: Amitabha Hand
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Put one of your shields into your graveyard. ■ Destroy one of your opponent's creatures.

card.name: Pteratox, Large Wing Chain
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may put a non-evolution nature creature that costs 4 or less from your mana zone into the battle zone. ■ When this creature loses a battle with a creature that has power greater than this creature, your opponent's creature is put into its owner's mana zone.

card.name: Spiral Hurricane, Hero Secret Technique
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Choose a creature in the battle zone and return it to its owner's hand. ■ Mana Arms

card.name: Chainrex, Super Chainkind
card.text: ■ When you put this creature or one of your nature creatures into the battle zone, you may put a nature creature that costs 2 less than that creature from your mana zone into the battle zone. ■ Triple Breaker

card.name: Protection Circle
card.text: ■ Add a card from your hand to your shields face down. ■ If you have more shields than your opponent, you may draw a card.

card.name: Scale of Life and Death
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Choose one of the following. :► Return up to 2 creatures from your graveyard to your hand. :► Choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature gets -5000 power until the End Step

card.name: Scale of Bravery and Love
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Choose one of the following. :► Discard a card from your hand, then draw 2 cards. :► Destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 2000 or less.

card.name: Yadoc, Beast Army
card.text: ■ Whenever your opponent would put a creature into the battle zone that costs more than the number of cards in their mana zone, they put it in their mana zone instead.

card.name: Wisdompheus, Dragonic Elemental
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ Double Breaker ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, look at the top 5 cards of your deck. From among them, you may take a spell, show that spell to your opponent and add it to your hand. Then put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may cast a spell from your hand that has "Spark" in its name For No Cost

card.name: Faerie Trap
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Reveal the top card of your deck then choose one of the following. :► Put that card into your mana zone. :► Choose one your opponent's creatures that costs less than the revealed card and put it into its owner's mana zone.

card.name: ChuChuris, First Squad
card.text: ■ Your Beat Jockey cost 1 less to summon. They can't cost 0 or less.

card.name: Dachicco Churis
card.text: ■ When you put this creature, this turn, the next Beat Jockey you summon may cost up to 3 less. It can't cost 0 or less.

card.name: Faywon, Green Knowledge Silver
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may tap one of your creatures. If you do, draw a card. ■ You may untap this creature to change your opponent's creatures attack to this creature or one of your tapped creatures.

card.name: Hemoglo, Demonic Doctor
card.text: ■ When you put this creature, your opponent chooses a card from their hand and discards it. ■ When this creature is destroyed during your turn, put it into the battle zone from your graveyard at the End Step

card.name: Hop Churis
card.text: ■ This creature can't attack if you didn't attack with another creature this turn.

card.name: Bakugetto, Totsugeki Tank
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may discard your hand. If you do, draw 2 cards.

card.name: Ball Bomb Bomber
card.text: ■ If you have 3 or more Beat Jockeys in the battle zone, this creature may cost up to 5 less to summon. It can't cost 0 or less. ■ Speed Attacker ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Sky Chain, Red Wrath
card.text: ■ Triple Breaker ■ This creature is put into the battle zone tapped. ■ If you have 6 shields or less, this creature doesn't untap. ■ Labyrinth: At the Step#Step 2 (Draw)

card.name: Althhus Ser
card.text: ■ Neo Evolution ■ Blocker ■ Slayer ■ If this is a Neo Evolution Creature, it gets +5000 power and has "double breaker". ''(A creature that has "double breaker breaks 2 shields.)''

card.name: Bobododo
card.text: ■ Neo Evolution ■ Whenever you put this creature into the battle zone or attacks, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

card.name: Chocolate House
card.text: ■ Whenever this creature attacks, put a card from your hand into your mana zone.

card.name: Utsuvoid, 4th City
card.text: ■ Neo Evolution ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of your opponent's creatures and return it to its owners hand. If this is a Neo Evolution Creature, your opponent can't summon creatures that costs the same as that creature during his next turn.

card.name: Chabanra, Shell Beast
card.text: ■ Neo Evolution ■ When this creature would be destroyed, return it to your hand instead.

card.name: Helcopta
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may draw a card for each of your Jokers in the battle zone.

card.name: Big Bang Flare
card.text: ■ Bad Action Dynamite Spell 2 ''(You may reduce this spells cast cost by 2. If you do, discard a card from your hand.)'' ■ You may put a Beat Jockey from your hand. If you do, choose one of your opponent's creatures. Those 2 creatures battle. At the End Step

card.name: Shocking Dantal
card.text: ■ Destroy one of your creatures. Then put a creature that costs 1 more than that creature from your graveyard into the battle zone.

card.name: Justy Luminarie
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ You may put a non-evolution light creature that costs 5 or less from your hand into the battle zone. ■ Labyrinth: If you have more shields than your opponent, you may put a non-evolution Metallica that costs 8 or less from your hand into the battle zone tapped.

card.name: One Eye's Judgment
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Choose one of your opponent's creatures and tap it. That creature doesn't untap at the start of your opponent's next turn. ■ After you cast this spell from your hand, put it on one of your shields Face Up

card.name: Meramera Jokers
card.text: ■ You may discard a Jokers from your hand. If you do, draw 2 cards.

card.name: Ial, Green Knowledge Silver
card.text: ■ Super Shield Trigger ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, if your opponent has more cards in their mana zone than you have in yours, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your mana zone. ■ Icon

card.name: Makuro, Strange Stone
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, look at the top 3 cards of your deck. You may choose a Metallica or a spell from among them, show that card to your opponent and add it to your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

card.name: Dupoiz, Darma
card.text: ■ Double Breaker ■ When you put this creature, destroy 2 of your creatures. Then your opponent chooses one of their creatures and destroys it.

card.name: Joe Star of Dreams
card.text: ■ Instead of paying the cost, you may tap 4 of your Jokers to cast this spell. ■ Look at the top 4 cards of your deck, put a card from among them into your hand, on the bottom of your deck, into your mana zone and on the top of your deck.

card.name: Duscissor, Darma
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. That creature gets -2000 power until the End Step

card.name: Yattare Sochou
card.text: ■ Your Jokers that cost 7 or more cost 1 less to summon. However, they can't cost 0 or less. ■ Whenever a card in the battle zone is put on the bottom of your deck, draw a card.

card.name: De Szark, Demon Phoenix
card.text: ■ Gate of Moonless Night ■ Double Breaker ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, each of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone gets -3000 power until the End Step

card.name: Hanabishi Hanako
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, return one of your shields to your hand. You can't use the "shield trigger" ability of that shield.

card.name: Nazomaru, Strongest Insect
card.text: ■ You may summon this creature from your mana zone. ■ Minomajikaru: At the start of your turn, you may put this creature into your mana zone tapped. If you do, choose a non-evolution creature that costs the same as or less than the number of cards in your mana zone and put it from your mana zone into the battle zone.

card.name: Super Demon Hand
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Destroy one of your opponent's creatures. Then put the same number of cards as that creature's cost from the top of your deck into your graveyard.

card.name: Missile Jet
card.text: ■ Gogogo Gangan Galaxy: If you have 1 or less card in your hand, this creature gets "speed attacker". ''(A creature that has "speed attacker" doesn't get summoning sickness.)''

card.name: Paua, Shell Beast
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ When you put this creature or when this creature is discarded by the effect of one of your opponent's spells or ability of your opponent's creature, you may draw 4 cards.

card.name: Pokchinchin
card.text: ■ When you put this creature, choose a player. That player shuffles all cards in their graveyard into their deck. ■ During your opponent's turn, whenever your opponent puts a creature into the battle zone For No Cost

card.text: ■ Mach Fighter ■ Whenever this creature wins a battle, reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. You may put a creature from among them into your hand. Put the rest into your mana zone. ■ Triple Breaker ========================= ■ Shuffle your deck, then reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a creature, put it into the battle zone. Otherwise, put it into your mana zone.

card.name: Goldenden Trap
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Choose one of your opponent's untapped creatures and put it into its owner's mana zone. ■ Put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

card.name: Hyde, Kiramekuseiheki
card.text: ■ Double Breaker ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, put all your shields into your hand. You can't use the "shield trigger" ability of those shields. Then add the top 5 cards of your deck to your shields face down.

card.text: ■ Sabaki Z ■ Blocker ========================= ■ Draw a card, then add a card from your hand to your shields face down.

You may put a Jokers card from among them into your hand. Put the rest under your deck in any order.
